data.comment: The match is underway in Watford.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Domingos Quina.
In the minute 1, Goal! Watford extend their lead to 2-0 through Troy Deeney.
James Garner (Watford) has received a first yellow card.
The home team replace Andre Gray with Joao Pedro.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Watford.
Goal! Preston reduce the deficit to 2-1 through Tom Barkhuizen.
In the minute 46, Goal! Nathaniel Chalobah extends Watford's lead to 3-1.
Watford take a comfortable 4-1 lead thanks to Joao Pedro.
Ryan Ledson is on a sub for Ben Pearson for Preston.
In the minute 70, Ben Wilmot is replacing Kiko Femenia for the home team.
The home team have replaced Troy Deeney with Stipe Perica. This is the third substitution made today by Vladan Ivic.
Preston make their second substitution with Tom Bayliss replacing Daniel Johnson.
In the minute 79, Jayden Stockley is replacing Emil Riis Jakobsen for Preston at Vicarage Road.
The away team replace Ben Davies with Paul Huntington.
Vladan Ivic is making the team's fourth substitution at Vicarage Road with Daniel Phillips replacing James Garner.
In the minute 87, Vladan Ivic (Watford) is making a fifth substitution, with Francisco Sierralta replacing Craig Cathcart.
The match has come to a close in Watford. The final score is 4-1.
